trans-unit.source: Defines the methods, properties, and events for server-side access to the HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 定義伺服器端存取 HTML5 <see langword="input" /> 項目的方法、屬性和事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> class based on the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的型別初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: 張貼的集合中的索引，此索引參考要載入的內容。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all posted values.
trans-unit.target: 所有已張貼之值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 處理 HTML5 <see langword="input" /> 項目的回傳資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the posted content differs from the content in a previous postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果張貼的內容不同於前一次回傳中的內容，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.ServerChange" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.ServerChange" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method when the posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> element has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> 項目的張貼資料已變更時，叫用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content of the HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當 HTML5 <see langword="input" /> 項目的內容在對伺服器進行的張貼之間變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The index in the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: 張貼的集合中的索引，此索引參考要載入的內容。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all posted values.
trans-unit.target: 所有已張貼之值的集合。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, processes postback data for an HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，處理 HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element 的回傳資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element changes because of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果因為回傳而改變了 HTML5 <see langword="true" /> 項目的狀態，則為 <see langword="input" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, invokes the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method when the posted data for the HTML5 <see langword="input" /> element has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，當已張貼的 HTML5 <see langword="input" /> 項目資料已變更時，叫用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputGenericControl> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
